original_text: And he built towers in the wilderness and cut out many cisterns, for he had large herds, both in the Shephelah and in the plain, and he had farmers and vinedressers in the hills and in the fertile lands, for he loved the soil.
korean_text: 또 광야에 망대를 세우고 물 웅덩이를 많이 파고 고원과 평지에 가축을 많이 길렀으며 또 여러 산과 좋은 밭에 농부와 포도원을 다스리는 자들을 두었으니 농사를 좋아함이었더라

sentences.original_text: And he built towers in the wilderness

sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그에게 큰 가축 떼가 있었기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: both in the Shephelah and in the plain
sentences.korean_translation: 그 가축 떼는 세펠라와 평야에 모두 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: and he had farmers and vinedressers
in the hills and in the fertile lands
